English: Our country has laws regulating factory pollution.
Our country is maintaing a strategic bomber force.
We have recently held a Communist International.
The manufacture and sale of narcotics and opoids are heavily regulated in this country.

The ineffectiveness of the Eight Banners and the Green Standard Army in preventing rebellion is evident. Qing military power now lies in regional milita personally loyal to their officers - not to the Qing court.
